Reference

Main functions

ens_random_forests()

Ensemble Random Forests

erf_impt()

Visualizes variable importance from ERF

calc_ALE()

Accumulated Local Effects for ERF

calc_ALE_multi()

Accumulated Local Effects for ERF for multivariate factors

plot_ALE()

Plots Accumulated Local Effects for ERF

plot_ALE_multi()

Plots Accumulated Local Effects for ERF for multivariate factors

Generally internally called

erf_data_prep()

Prepare a data.frame for ERF

erf_formula_prep()

Make a formula for ERF use

max_splitter()

Determines the maximum sample size in the second RF bag

rf_ens_fn()

Random Forest model with additional bagging

rocr_ens()

Receiver Operator Characteristic Curve calculations

ALE_fn()

Accumulated Local Effects workhorse

Example data

simData

Example dataset for use with ERF
